vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) thus, here, in this manner
1a) thus, so
1b) here, here and there
1c) until now, until now...until then, meanwhile
Aramaic equivalent: kah (כָּה "thus" H3542)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) (事情)如此, 這般
2) (地方)這裡, 這邊與那邊
3} (時間)到目前為止 (出7:16;書17:14)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) (事情)如此, 这般
2) (地方)这里, 这边与那边
3} (时间)到目前为止 (出7:16;书17:14)
